Qieyun: 日開三侵平?, 日開三侵去?

English: to be of a heroic temperament

Qieyun: 邪合三仙平?, 邪合三仙去?

English: the whirlwind feat (brandishing a weight in some way over the head)
the title of reign of emperor Chuang-lieh-ti of the Ming dynasty

Qieyun: 定開四先去?, 端開四先去?

English: the palace examination (for admission of selected doctors 進士 to the Han-lin 翰林 College)
to seat in formal manner; to seat and wait

Qieyun: 透開四蕭平?, 透開一豪平?, 定開四蕭上?
影開三B支上?, 影開三B支去?

English: to seat and wait (for a danger)
a period of two hours; the first night-watch
near to the end; nearly gone
